00019 template <class T>
00020 void addBorders(Image<T> &im,
00021                                         TCoord *preWidth,
00022                                         TCoord *postWidth,
00023                                         T value)
00024 {
00025         TSize *imSize = im.getSize();
00026         
00027         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00028         {
00029                 imSize[i] += preWidth[i] + postWidth[i];
00030         }
00031 
00032         Image<T> temp(imSize);
00033         
00034         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00035         typename Image<T>::iterator end=temp.end();
00036         
00037         std::fill(temp.begin(), end,value);
00038         temp.copy(im, preWidth[0],preWidth[1],preWidth[2]);
00039 
00040         im= temp;
00041 }
00042 
00043 template <class T>
00044 void addBorders(Image<T> &im, FlatSE &se, T value)
00045 {
00046         TSize *imSize = im.getSize();
00047         
00048         TCoord *backOffsets = new TCoord [3];
00049         TCoord *frontOffsets = new TCoord [3];
00050         
00051         FlatSE::iterator_point itSe;
00052         FlatSE::iterator_point endSe=se.end_point();
00053         
00054         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) backOffsets[i] = std::numeric_limits<TCoord>::max();
00055         for (itSe=se.begin_point(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00056         {
00057                 backOffsets[0] = std::min(backOffsets[0],(itSe->x));
00058                 backOffsets[1] = std::min(backOffsets[1],(itSe->y));
00059                 backOffsets[2] = std::min(backOffsets[2],(itSe->z));
00060         }
00061         
00062         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) frontOffsets[i] = std::numeric_limits<TCoord>::min();;
00063         for (itSe=se.begin_point(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00064         {
00065                 frontOffsets[0] = std::max(frontOffsets[0],(itSe->x));
00066                 frontOffsets[1] = std::max(frontOffsets[1],(itSe->y));
00067                 frontOffsets[2] = std::max(frontOffsets[2],(itSe->z));
00068         }
00069         
00070         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00071         {
00072                 imSize[i] += backOffsets[i] + frontOffsets[i];
00073         }
00074 
00075         Image<T> temp(imSize);
00076         
00077         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00078         typename Image<T>::iterator end=temp.end();
00079         
00080         std::fill(temp.begin(), end,value);
00081         temp.copy(im, backOffsets[0],backOffsets[1],backOffsets[2]);
00082 
00083         im= temp;
00084 }

00092 template <class T>
00093 Image<T> dilation(Image<T> im, FlatSE se)
00094 {
00095         Image<T> res(im.getSize() );
00096         
00097         //Symmetric of structuring element, according to Heijman's definition of dilation
00098         se.makeSymmetric();
00099         
00100         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00101         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00102         
00103         T minValue=std::numeric_limits<T>::min();
00104         addBorders(im,back,front,minValue);
00105         se.setContext(im.getSize());
00106         
00107         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ it;
00108         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ end=res.end();
00109         
00110         FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00111         FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00112         
00113         T min=std::numeric_limits<T>::min();
00114         
00115         T currentMax;
00116 
00117         for(it=res.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00118                 {
00119                 currentMax = min;
00120                 TOffset offsetRes = im.getOffset(it.x + back[0], it.y + back[1], it.z + back[2]);
00121                 for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00122                         {
00123                         TOffset offsetIm=offsetRes+*itSe;
00124                         currentMax=std::max(currentMax,im(offsetIm) );
00125                         }
00126                 *it=currentMax;
00127                 }
00128         
00129         return  res;
00130 }

00138 template <class T>
00139 Image<T> erosion(Image<T> im, FlatSE se)
00140 {
00141         Image<T> res(im.getSize() );
00142         
00143         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00144         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();

00146         T maxValue=std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00147         addBorders(im,back,front,maxValue);
00148         se.setContext(im.getSize());
00149         
00150         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ it;
00151         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ end=res.end();
00152         
00153         FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00154         FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00155         
00156         T max=std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00157         
00158         T currentMin;
00159 
00160         for(it=res.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00161                 {
00162                 currentMin = max;

00165                         {

00268 template <class T>
00269 Image <T> opening(Image<T> im, FlatSE se)
00270 {
00271         return dilation(erosion(im,se),se);

00280 template <class T>
00281 Image <T> closing(Image<T> im, FlatSE se)
00282 {
00283         return erosion(dilation(im,se),se);
00284 }

00294 template <class T>
00295 Image <T> morphologicalGradient(Image <T> im, FlatSE se)
00296 {
00297         Image <T> tmp=erosion(im,se);
00298         im=dilation(im,se);
00299         im-=tmp;
00300         return im;
00301 }

00311 template <class T>
00312 Image <T> internalMorphologicalGradient(Image <T> im, FlatSE se)
00313 {
00314         Image <T> tmp=erosion(im,se);
00315         im-=tmp;
00316         return im;
00317 }

00327 template <class T>
00328 Image <T> externalMorphologicalGradient(Image <T> im, FlatSE se)
00329 {
00330         Image <T> tmp=dilation(im,se);
00331         tmp-=im;
00332         return tmp;
00333 }

00343 //Border problem solutions: enlarge image by copying border pixels, by mirroring the image, or simply using
00344 //max or min global value, or max or min neighboring value
00345 //For now: we take the n iest element, and fill the border with max value
00346 
00347 template <class T>
00348 Image<T> rankFilter(Image<T> im, FlatSE se, int rank)
00349 {
00350         int neighborSize=se.getNbPoints();
00351         
00352         if(rank<=0)
00353                 return erosion(im,se);
00354                 
00355         if(rank>=neighborSize-1)
00356                 return dilation(im,se);
00357         else
00358                 {       
00359                 Image<T> res(im.getSize() );
00360                 
00361                 TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00362                 TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00363                 
00364                 T maxValue=std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00365                 addBorders(im,back,front,maxValue);
00366                 se.setContext(im.getSize());
00367                 
00368                 typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ it;
00369                 typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ end=res.end();
00370                 
00371                 FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00372                 FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00373                 
00374                 T *neighborsPtr=new T[neighborSize];
00375                 
00376                 T *currentNeighbor;
00377                 int nElt;
00378                 
00379                 for(it=res.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00380                         {
00381                         currentNeighbor=neighborsPtr;
00382                         nElt=0;
00383                         TOffset offsetRes = im.getOffset(it.x + back[0], it.y + back[1], it.z + back[2]);
00384                         for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00385                                 {
00386                                 TOffset offsetIm=offsetRes+*itSe;
00387                                 T el=im(offsetIm);
00388                                 *currentNeighbor=el;
00389                                 currentNeighbor++;
00390                                 }
00391 
00392                         std::sort(neighborsPtr,neighborsPtr+neighborSize );
00393                         *it=neighborsPtr[rank];
00394                         }
00395                 
00396                 return  res;
00397         }
00398 }

00421 template <class T>
00422 Image <U8> regionalMinima(Image <T> img, FlatSE se)
00423 {
00424         std::queue<TOffset> fifo;
00425         
00426         //std::fill(imgMinima, &imgMinima[img.getBufSize()],true);
00427         
00428         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00429         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00430         
00431         U8 isNonExtrema=0;
00432         U8 isExtrema=1;
00433         U8 isBorder=2;
00434         T maxValue=std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00435         
00436         Image <T> im=img;
00437         Image<U8> imgMinima(img.getSize());
00438         imgMinima.fill(isExtrema);
00439         
00440         addBorders(im,back,front,maxValue);
00441         addBorders(imgMinima,back,front,isBorder);
00442         se.setContext(im.getSize());
00443         
00444         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00445         typename Image<T>::iterator end=im.end();
00446         
00447         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ itxyz;
00448         
00449         typename FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00450         typename FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00451         
00452         TOffset curOffset=0;
00453         for(it=im.begin(); it!=end; ++it,curOffset++)
00454                 {
00455                 TOffset p=curOffset;
00456                 
00457                 if(imgMinima(p)==isExtrema)
00458                         {
00459                         for(itSe=se.begin();  itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00460                                         {
00461                                         TOffset  q= p+ *itSe;
00462                                         if(im(q) < im(p))
00463                                                 {
00464                                                 //p has a neighbor q with lesser intensity: p belongs not to a regional minima
00465                                                 //we propagate to eliminate all neighbors having an intensity equal or superior
00466                                                         
00467                                                 fifo.push(p);
00468                                                 break;
00469                                                 }
00470                                         }       
00471                                 while(fifo.empty()!=true)
00472                                         {
00473                                         TOffset p=fifo.front();
00474                                         fifo.pop();
00475                                         imgMinima(p)=isNonExtrema;
00476                                         
00477                                         for(itSe=se.begin();  itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00478                                                 {
00479                                                 TOffset q= p + *itSe;
00480                                                 if(im(q)>=im(p) && imgMinima(q)==isExtrema)
00481                                                         {
00482                                                         imgMinima(q)=isNonExtrema;
00483                                                         fifo.push(q);
00484                                                         }
00485                                                 }
00486                                         }
00487                                 }
00488                 }
00489         
00490         //Reste le recadrage dans les dimensions originales.
00491         //utiliser classe spécifique?
00492         
00493         Image <U8> result(img.getSize() );
00494         typename Image<U8>::iteratorXYZ itLabelXYZ;
00495         typename Image<U8>::iteratorXYZ endRes=result.end();
00496         
00497         for(itLabelXYZ=result.begin(); itLabelXYZ!=endRes; ++itLabelXYZ)
00498                 {
00499                 if(imgMinima(itLabelXYZ.x+back[0], itLabelXYZ.y+back[1], itLabelXYZ.z+back[2])==true)
00500                         *itLabelXYZ=255;
00501                 else *itLabelXYZ=0;
00502                 }
00503         
00504         
00505         return result;  
00506 }

00522 template <class T>
00523 Image <U8> regionalMaxima(Image <T> img, FlatSE se)
00524 {
00525         std::queue<TOffset> fifo;
00526         
00527         //std::fill(imgMinima, &imgMinima[img.getBufSize()],true);
00528         
00529         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00530         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00531         
00532         U8 isNonExtrema=0;
00533         U8 isExtrema=1;
00534         U8 isBorder=2;
00535         T minValue=std::numeric_limits<T>::min();
00536         
00537         Image <T> im=img;
00538         Image<U8> imgMaxima(img.getSize());
00539         imgMaxima.fill(isExtrema);
00540         
00541         addBorders(im,back,front,minValue);
00542         addBorders(imgMaxima,back,front,isBorder);
00543         se.setContext(im.getSize());
00544         
00545         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00546         typename Image<T>::iterator end=im.end();
00547         
00548         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ itxyz;
00549         
00550         typename FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00551         typename FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00552         
00553         TOffset curOffset=0;
00554         for(it=im.begin(); it!=end; ++it,curOffset++)
00555                 {
00556                 TOffset p=curOffset;
00557                 
00558                 if(imgMaxima(p)==isExtrema)
00559                         {
00560                         for(itSe=se.begin();  itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00561                                         {
00562                                         TOffset  q= p+ *itSe;
00563                                         if(im(q) > im(p))
00564                                                 {
00565                                                 //p has a neighbor q with higher intensity: p belongs not to a regional minima
00566                                                 //we propagate to eliminate all neighbors having an intensity equal or superior
00567                                                         
00568                                                 fifo.push(p);
00569                                                 break;
00570                                                 }
00571                                         }       
00572                                 while(fifo.empty()!=true)
00573                                         {
00574                                         TOffset p=fifo.front();
00575                                         fifo.pop();
00576                                         imgMaxima(p)=isNonExtrema;
00577                                         
00578                                         for(itSe=se.begin();  itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00579                                                 {
00580                                                 TOffset q= p + *itSe;
00581                                                 if(im(q)<=im(p) && imgMaxima(q)==isExtrema)
00582                                                         {
00583                                                         imgMaxima(q)=isNonExtrema;
00584                                                         fifo.push(q);
00585                                                         }
00586                                                 }
00587                                         }
00588                                 }
00589                 }
00590         
00591         //Reste le recadrage dans les dimensions originales.
00592         //utiliser classe spécifique?
00593         
00594         Image <U8> result(img.getSize() );
00595         typename Image<U8>::iteratorXYZ itLabelXYZ;
00596         typename Image<U8>::iteratorXYZ endRes=result.end();
00597         
00598         for(itLabelXYZ=result.begin(); itLabelXYZ!=endRes; ++itLabelXYZ)
00599                 {
00600                 if((imgMaxima(itLabelXYZ.x+back[0], itLabelXYZ.y+back[1], itLabelXYZ.z+back[2])==true) )
00601                         *itLabelXYZ=255;
00602                 else *itLabelXYZ=0;
00603                 }
00604 
00605         return result;  
00606 }

00617 
00625 template <class T>
00626 void geodesicReconstructionByErosion(Image <T> &marker, Image <T> mask, FlatSE &se)
00627 {
00628         OrderedQueue <TOffset> oq;
00629         
00630         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00631         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00632         
00633         Image <T> imInf=mask;
00634         Image <T> imSup=marker;
00635         Image <bool> imActivePoints(mask.getSize());
00636         imActivePoints.fill(true);
00637         
00638         T maxValue=std::numeric_limits<T>::max(); 
00639         
00640         addBorders(imInf,back,front,maxValue);
00641         addBorders(imSup,back,front,maxValue);
00642         addBorders(imActivePoints,back,front,false);
00643         
00644         se.setContext(imSup.getSize());
00645         
00646         //put all marker points in the queue
00647         //lowest points are more prioritary
00648         //note that only extrema are necessary: 
00649         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00650         typename Image<T>::iterator end=imSup.end();
00651         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ itxyz;
00652         
00653         TOffset offset=0;
00654         for(itxyz=imSup.begin(); itxyz!=end; ++itxyz,offset++)
00655                 {
00656                 if(imActivePoints(offset)==true)
00657                         oq.put(*itxyz,offset);
00658                 }
00659                 
00660         FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00661         FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00662         
00663         while(!oq.empty())
00664                 {
00665                 TOffset p=oq.get();
00666                 for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00667                         {
00668                         TOffset q=p+ *itSe;
00669                         if(imActivePoints(q)==true)
00670                                 { 
00671                                 imSup(q)=std::max(imSup(p),imInf(q) );
00672                                 oq.put(imSup(q),q);
00673                                 imActivePoints(q)=false;
00674                                 }
00675                         }
00676                 }
00677                 
00678         Image <T> result(marker.getSize() );
00679         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ itLabelXYZ;
00680         for(itLabelXYZ=result.begin(); itLabelXYZ!=result.end(); ++itLabelXYZ)
00681                 {
00682                 *itLabelXYZ=imSup(itLabelXYZ.x+back[0], itLabelXYZ.y+back[1], itLabelXYZ.z+back[2]);
00683                 }
00684         marker=result;
00685 }
00686 
00688 
00696 template <class T>
00697 void geodesicReconstructionByDilation(Image <T> &marker, Image <T> mask, FlatSE &se)
00698 {
00699         OrderedQueue <TOffset> oq;
00700         
00701         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00702         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00703         
00704         Image <T> imSup=mask;
00705         Image <T> imInf=marker;
00706         Image <bool> imActivePoints(mask.getSize());
00707         imActivePoints.fill(true);
00708         
00709         T minValue=std::numeric_limits<T>::min(); 
00710         
00711         addBorders(imInf,back,front,minValue);
00712         addBorders(imSup,back,front,minValue);
00713         addBorders(imActivePoints,back,front,false);
00714         
00715         se.setContext(imInf.getSize());
00716         
00717         //put all marker points in the queue
00718         //highest points are more prioritary, so priority is reversed
00719         //note that only extrema are necessary: 
00720         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00721         typename Image<T>::iterator end=imInf.end();
00722         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ itxyz;
00723         
00724         TOffset offset=0;
00725         for(itxyz=imInf.begin(); itxyz!=end; ++itxyz,offset++)
00726                 {
00727                 if(imActivePoints(offset)==true)
00728                         oq.put(-*itxyz,offset);
00729                 }
00730                 
00731         FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00732         FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00733         
00734         while(!oq.empty())
00735                 {
00736                 TOffset p=oq.get();
00737                 for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00738                         {
00739                         TOffset q=p+ *itSe;
00740                         if(imActivePoints(q)==true)
00741                                 { 
00742                                 imInf(q)=std::min(imInf(p),imSup(q) );
00743                                 oq.put(imInf(q),q);
00744                                 imActivePoints(q)=false;
00745                                 }
00746                         }
00747                 }
00748                 
00749         Image <T> result(marker.getSize() );
00750         typename Image<T>::iteratorXYZ itLabelXYZ;
00751         for(itLabelXYZ=result.begin(); itLabelXYZ!=result.end(); ++itLabelXYZ)
00752                 {
00753                 *itLabelXYZ=imSup(itLabelXYZ.x+back[0], itLabelXYZ.y+back[1], itLabelXYZ.z+back[2]);
00754                 }
00755         marker=result;
00756 }

00774 //Warning: potential overflow problem due to type limitation (when using U8)
00775 template <class T>
00776 void hMinFilter(Image <T> &img, FlatSE &se, int h)
00777 {
00778         Image <T> mask=img;
00779         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00780         typename Image<T>::iterator end=img.end();
00781         for(it=img.begin(); it!=end ; ++it)
00782                 *it+=h;
00783         geodesicReconstructionByErosion(img,mask,se);   
00784 }

00795 template <class T>
00796 void hMaxFilter(Image <T> &img, FlatSE &se, int h)
00797 {
00798         Image <T> mask=img;
00799         typename Image<T>::iterator it;
00800         typename Image<T>::iterator end=img.end();
00801         for(it=img.begin(); it!=end ; ++it)
00802                 *it-=h;
00803         geodesicReconstructionByDilation(img,mask,se);
00804 }
00805 
00814 
00816 
00824 //Be warned: seB is symmetrized in the function (according to definition)
00825 //Functions use erosionBorderMin: when template hits the border, no detection occurs
00826 //First version: returns an image <int> being the aritmetic difference between erosion and dilation
00827 //Resulting image can be used afterwards to search the most responding point to the operator
00828 
00829 template <class T>
00830 Image <int> hitOrMissDifferenceImage(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &seA, FlatSE &seB)
00831 {
00832         Image <T> eroA=im;
00833         Image <T> dilB=im;
00834         
00835         FlatSE seBSym=seB;
00836         seBSym.makeSymmetric();
00837         
00838         eroA=erosionBorderMin(im,seA);
00839         dilB=dilationBorderMax(im,seBSym);
00840                 
00841         Image <int> res(im.getSize());
00842         
00843         typename Image<T>::iterator itRes;
00844         typename Image<T>::iterator endRes=im.end();
00845         
00846         typename Image<T>::iterator itEro=eroA.begin();
00847         typename Image<T>::iterator itDil=dilB.begin();
00848         
00849         int minValue=std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00850         
00851         for(itRes=im.begin(); itRes!=endRes; ++itRes,++itEro,++itDil)
00852                 {
00853                 if(*itEro!= minValue)
00854                         *itRes=(int)*itEro-(int)*itDil;
00855                 else *itRes=*itEro;
00856                 }
00857                 
00858         return res;
00859 }
00860 
00862 
00866 template <class T>
00867 int hitOrMissMaximumDifference(Image <T> im, FlatSE &seA, FlatSE &seB)
00868 {
00869         Image <T> eroA=im;
00870         Image <T> dilB=im;
00871         
00872         FlatSE seBSym=seB;
00873         seBSym.makeSymmetric();
00874         
00875         eroA=erosionBorderMin(im,seA);
00876         dilB=dilation(im,seBSym);
00877         
00878         typename Image<T>::iterator itRes;
00879         typename Image<T>::iterator endRes=im.end();
00880         
00881         typename Image<int>::iterator itEro=eroA.begin();
00882         typename Image<int>::iterator itDil=dilB.begin();
00883         
00884         int currentMax=std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00885         
00886         for(itRes=im.begin(); itRes!=endRes; ++itRes,++itEro,++itDil)
00887                 {
00888                 int diff=*itEro-*itDil;
00889                 
00890                 if(diff>currentMax) currentMax= diff;
00891                 }
00892         
00893         return currentMax;
00894 }

00902 template <class T>
00903 Image <T> hitOrMissIntegralK(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &seA, FlatSE &seB)
00904 {
00905         Image <T> res(im.getSize());
00906         Image <T> eroA(im.getSize());
00907         Image <T> dilB(im.getSize());
00908         
00909         FlatSE seBSym=seB;
00910         seBSym.makeSymmetric();
00911         
00912         eroA=erosion(im,seA);
00913         dilB=dilation(im,seBSym);
00914         
00915         typename Image<T>::iterator itRes;
00916         typename Image<T>::iterator endRes=res.end();
00917         
00918         typename Image<T>::iterator itEro=eroA.begin();
00919         typename Image<T>::iterator itDil=dilB.begin();
00920         
00921         int currentMax=std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00922         
00923         for(itRes=res.begin(); itRes!=endRes; ++itRes,++itEro,++itDil)
00924                 {
00925                 int diff=(int)*itEro-(int)*itDil;
00926                 
00927                 if(diff > 0) *itRes=diff;
00928                 else {*itRes=T(0); }
00929                 
00930                 if(diff>currentMax) currentMax= diff;
00931                 }
00932         std::cout <<"Integral HMT: Max difference: " << currentMax << "\n";
00933         return res;
00934 }

00941 template <class T>
00942 Image <T> hitOrMissSupremalH(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &seA, FlatSE &seB)
00943 {
00944         Image <T> res(im.getSize());
00945         Image <T> eroA(im.getSize());
00946         Image <T> dilB(im.getSize());
00947         
00948         FlatSE seBSym=seB;
00949         seBSym.makeSymmetric();
00950         
00951         eroA=erosion(im,seA);
00952         dilB=dilation(im,seBSym);
00953         
00954         //eroA.save("eroA.pgm");
00955         //dilB.save("dilB.pgm");
00956         
00957         T minValue=im.getMin();
00958         
00959         typename Image<T>::iterator itRes;
00960         typename Image<T>::iterator endRes=res.end();
00961         
00962         typename Image<T>::iterator itEro=eroA.begin();
00963         typename Image<T>::iterator itDil=dilB.begin();
00964         
00965         int currentMax=std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00966         
00967         for(itRes=res.begin(); itRes!=endRes; ++itRes,++itEro,++itDil)
00968                 {
00969                 int diff=(int)*itEro-*itDil;
00970                 
00971                 if(diff >= 0) *itRes=*itEro;
00972                 else {*itRes=minValue; }
00973                 
00974                 if(diff>currentMax) currentMax= diff;
00975                 }
00976         std::cout <<"Supremal H  HMT: Max difference: " << currentMax << "\n";
00977         
00978         return res;
00979 }

00992         Image <T> dilB(im.getSize());

01002

01008         typename Image<T>::iterator itEro=eroA.begin();

01048 
01054 template <class T>
01055 Image <T> hitOrMissIntegralKOpening(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &seA, FlatSE &seB)
01056 {
01057         Image <T> res(im.getSize() );
01058         res=hitOrMissIntegralK(im,seA,seB);
01059         res=dilation(res,seA);
01060         
01061         return res;
01062 }
